text: Timro lagi mrtaka janavara, ragata, sumgurako masu ra juna kurama allaha baheka aru kasaiko nama pukarincha, harama (varjita) bana'i'eko cha, tara jo majabura cha ra allahako adesako sima ullanghana ra avasyakta (prana baca'una) ko sima naghdaina, tyasa nirupaya vyaktiko lagi kunai papa humdaina. (Nihsandeha) allaha ksama pradana garnevala, dayavana cha
